notes: base lemma; invariable; accent on final 'à'

example_sentence_english: I have discovered some new truths.

example_sentence_italian: Il peso della verità è grande.
example_sentence_english: The weight of the truth is great.
You cannot escape from the truth.
He writes an essay about the truth.
We talk about the uncomfortable truths.
We rely on the historical truths.
I learn from the truths I discover.
We seek meaning in other people's truths.

example_sentence_italian: Il documentario indaga sulle verità taciute.
example_sentence_english: The documentary investigates the hidden truths.
With the truths we can change.
